Node.Text: Do you know anything about Mr. Lindson, the previous apartment owner?
No, not really, I've just heard the rumors of foul play.
It looks like I should get going. Good day, Mr. Devlin.
Just what everyone else has heard; however, I never knew the man to be depressed. There have been whispers that someone's trying to get at his profits.
How would you have heard that? That's something most would try to keep hidden.
I'm just repeating what others have said. There's no telling where the rumors came from.
Now, thank you, but I must be off.
Would you happen to know who began those rumors?
No, I'm afraid not. Living here, with eveyone so close together, you hear lots of things in passing. Of course, it also helps if you know how to rearrange some letters here and there...
